raw_body: AMERASEKERA – The death is announced of HERMAN EUSTACE AMERASEKERA – Beloved husband of Laurette,​ brother of Chumley,​ brother-in-law of Savithri,​ uncle of Lalindra. Cortege leaves residence No. 79A,​ Allan Avenue,​ Dehiwela at 3.00 p.m. on Tuesday 21st for cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella. Cremation at 4.30 p.m. at the New Crematorium.033897
